resources.string: It is very lonely in here. Please use the menu to add a new car.
You have entered a year lower than 1672. That was the year the first ever steam car was built. Please enter a year higher than or equal to 1672.
You have entered a year higher than the current year. Please enter a year lower than, or equal to the current year.
You have entered an illegal value or no value at all. Please enter a year between 1672 and the current year.
This field may not be empty.
There was a problem saving the car into the database.
